trans-unit.source:
\n

Provides a type converter to convert Unicode character objects to and from various other representations.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxx x xxxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxx Xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xx xxx xxxx xxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets a value indicating whether this converter can convert an object in the given source type to a Unicode character object using the specified context.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx x xxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxx xxxxxx xxxx xx x Xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: true if this converter can perform the conversion; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx$ xxxxxxxxx$ $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Converts the given object to a Unicode character object.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xxxxxx xx x Xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The culture into which value will be converted.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxx $xx$xxxxx$$xx$ xxxx xx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

\nvalue is not a valid value for the target type.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xx$xxxxx$$xx$ xx xxx x xxxxx xxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxx xxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Converts the given value object to a Unicode character object using the arguments.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xxxxx xxxxxx xx x Xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The culture into which value will be converted.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxx $xx$xxxxx$$xx$ xxxx xx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x
